headline: Mohawk Industries: Reiterate Hold Rating As Demand Outlook Remains Poor
summary: Mohawk Industries reported 1Q25 net sales of ~$2.5 billion, which was a 5.7% y/y decrease on a reported basis. Read why I maintain a hold rating on MHK stock.
